item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Weird Lexical Syntax (223 points | 85 comments)

26. Nvidia to join Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing Intel (334 points | 182 comments)
27. The 1600s were a watershed for swear words (2022) (95 points | 96 comments)

29. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (November 2024) (108 points | 228 comments)
